title: Online School Platform LEON
paragraph: Developed this project with a team in a high-intensity internship program where I have participated as a full-stack developer working with React.js and Java. In one month, our team has managed to create a fully-functional application for online-schooling to make studying and teaching easier at home during the pandemic.
